TopicTitle: How do I create custom categories for Flags in 1.11?

Articles.Content:
After they added new categories for flags, I've wanted to add my own. I see the files titled "Flags", "FlagsOrganizations", and "FlagsAgency" and I can add/remove flags from there. But how do I add, remove, or rename the categories?

Edited December 21, 2020 by Starman.jpeg
Grammar

I'd love to know that too, I've tried creating some new categories by simply creating some folders named similar to the original folders ,,FlagsCountries" for example, but that didn't work, maybe you'll have to add the folders name in a file, which I haven't found yet. I was also surprised to see that the Flags and Decals mod by TerraVexillar, though being updated to the newest Version, does not add any new categories, what I somehow expected. Let me know if you found a way to do it.

Edited: Sorry, I misunderstood the question, and my answer has no sense here.

Edited January 1, 2021 by frikeldon
